resources.string: The Ahsanullah University of Science and Technology(AUST) was founded by the Dhaka Ahsania Mission in 1995. It is the only private University specially for Engineering.AUST is contributing in the engineering sectors of Bangladesh since its establishment.
There are total Eight departments in AUST.Seven of them are of Engineering and the other one is Bachelor of Business Administration(BBA).

First you have to apply for admission.Then according to SSC and HSC result the eligible applicants list for admission test will be published.Then you have to sit for the admission test.After that a final merit list will be published.
Eligible candidates will be called for subject choise.According to the merit list the candidates will be able to choose departments.
